alert.note: Alert for El Paso (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued October 02 at 2:23PM MDT until October 02 at 2:45PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pueblo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central El Paso County in east central Colorado... * Until 245 PM MDT. * At 222 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Fountain, or 16 miles southeast of Colorado Springs, moving north at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Southeastern Colorado Springs, Fountain, Ellicott, Schriever Space Force Base, Security-Widefield, Peterson Space Force Base and Cimarron Hills. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
